data.title: Skyview Middle School
data.text:
Below are the sports being offered at Skyview for the 2024 Fall season:

Girls Volleyball (7-8)

Girls Tennis (6-8)

Girls Soccer (7-8)

Boys Soccer (7-8)

Coed Flag Football (6-8)

Sports will be held Monday-Thursday. Practices will be held from 2:15-3:45 with an after school bus available for students at 4pm ( There are 3 after school bus routes available). All schedules will be posted on the activities page once the schedules are finalized. All sports will start on Thursday, September 5th with a meeting/practice starting at 2:15. Students should attend this meeting if they plan on playing a sport this fall.

If interested in participating your child must have a sports physical on file in our nurses office in order to sign up. 2024-25-Sports Physical Form Your medical clinic can fax this to the school at 651-702-8091 or you can drop off at the Skyview.

Sign up information can be found at https://skyview.isd622.org/ athletics. In order to qualify for reduced prices for athletics you need to click on this link https://www.isd622.org/ services/nutrition and fill out the registration form and allow a few days for it to get into the system. At that time, if you qualify for a reduced rate it will show the correct fee for your family at that time.

If you have any questions feel free to contact Curt Russell at crussell@isd622.org.

FREE SPORTS PHYSICALS

In partnership with HealthPartners, the District will again offer a free sports physical clinic at our Well@Work Clinic located in the District Education Center. The focus of this event is to assist those students who want to participate in sports, but may have limited funds or access for the physical required by MSHSL (Minnesota State High School League).

The free sports physical clinic will be available for two days on Wednesday, July 31 (6 am - 2 pm) and Thursday, August 1 (10 am - 6 pm). Please see attached HealthPartners consent form and the Physical Examination Medical Eligibility Form (MSHSL form) for the 2024-2025 year.
